import React from 'react' import {Link, useLocation, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; export const Navbar = () => { let location = useLocation(); let navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = ()=>{ localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('PMTusername') navigate("/login"); } return (
